author: MiniWarGaming
description:
We built a HUGE table to film Necromunda, Horus Heresy Zone Mortalis, Warhammer 40k, and other fun sci-fi wargames.  *But we need to give it away!*  Since the tiles have now changed in size and magnet hole orientation these are no longer useful to us (after we're done the Kickstarter of course).

Sign up at https://www.miniwargaming.com/perdition to enter (for FREE) for you chance to win *1 of 2 of these pre-painted tables*
title: A HUGE table for Horus Heresy Zone Mortalis
